languages.text: {n}Обгоревшие губы юноши кривятся в блаженной улыбке, и в уголке изуродованной глазницы проявляется слеза.{/n} "Бог-Император послал вас, чтобы спасти меня... Вы — свет... вы — милость... Спасибо, спасибо, что не бросили меня здесь!.."

{n}A blissful smile twists the man's lips, and a tear forms at the corner of his ruined eye socket.{/n} "The God-Emperor has sent you to save me... You are His light... You are His grace... Thank you... Thank you for not leaving me here..."
languages.original_text: {n}Обгоревшие губы юноши кривятся в блаженной улыбке, и в уголке изуродованной глазницы проявляется слеза.{/n} "Бог-Император послал вас, чтобы спасти меня... Вы — свет... вы — милость... Спасибо, спасибо, что не бросили меня здесь!.."

{n}A blissful smile twists the man's lips, and a tear forms at the corner of his ruined eye socket.{/n} "The God-Emperor has sent you to save me... You are His light... You are His grace... Thank you... Thank you for not leaving me here..."

languages.text: {n}Un sourire béat vient tordre les lèvres de l'homme, tandis qu'une larme unique se forme au coin de son orbite esquintée.{/n} « L'Empereur-Dieu vous a demandé de me sauver... Vous êtes Sa lumière... Sa grâce... Merci... Merci de ne pas m'abandonner ici... »
languages.original_text: {n}A blissful smile twists the man's lips, and a tear forms at the corner of his ruined eye socket.{/n} "The God-Emperor has sent you to save me... You are His light... You are His grace... Thank you... Thank you for not leaving me here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire béat vient tordre les lèvres de l'homme, tandis qu'une larme unique se forme au coin de son orbite esquintée.{/n} « L'Empereur-Dieu vous a demandé de me sauver... Vous êtes Sa lumière... Sa grâce... Merci... Merci de ne pas m'abandonner ici... »

languages.text: {n}Una sonrisa feliz tuerce la boca del hombre y una lágrima asoma en su cuenca destrozada.{/n} «El Dios Emperador le envía... es usted Su luz... Su gracia... Gracias... Gracias por no abandonarme...».
languages.original_text: {n}A blissful smile twists the man's lips, and a tear forms at the corner of his ruined eye socket.{/n} "The God-Emperor has sent you to save me... You are His light... You are His grace... Thank you... Thank you for not leaving me here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonrisa feliz tuerce la boca del hombre y una lágrima asoma en su cuenca destrozada.{/n} «El Dios Emperador le envía... es usted Su luz... Su gracia... Gracias... Gracias por no abandonarme...».

languages.text: {n}至福に満ちた微笑みで男の唇は歪み、ぐちゃぐちゃの目元に涙が浮かぶ。{/n}「神帝陛下が、私を救うためにあなた様を送ってくれた…あなた様はあのお方の御光…あのお方の恩寵…感謝します…見捨てず、いてくれて…」
languages.original_text: {n}A blissful smile twists the man's lips, and a tear forms at the corner of his ruined eye socket.{/n} "The God-Emperor has sent you to save me... You are His light... You are His grace... Thank you... Thank you for not leaving me here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}至福に満ちた微笑みで男の唇は歪み、ぐちゃぐちゃの目元に涙が浮かぶ。{/n}「神帝陛下が、私を救うためにあなた様を送ってくれた…あなた様はあのお方の御光…あのお方の恩寵…感謝します…見捨てず、いてくれて…」

languages.text: {n}男人的嘴角露出了至福的微笑，被烧坏的眼窝里噙满了泪水。{/n}“神皇派你来救我了……你是祂的明光……你是祂的恩典……谢谢你……谢谢你没有把我丢在这里……”
languages.original_text: {n}A blissful smile twists the man's lips, and a tear forms at the corner of his ruined eye socket.{/n} "The God-Emperor has sent you to save me... You are His light... You are His grace... Thank you... Thank you for not leaving me here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}男人的嘴角露出了至福的微笑，被烧坏的眼窝里噙满了泪水。{/n}“神皇派你来救我了……你是祂的明光……你是祂的恩典……谢谢你……谢谢你没有把我丢在这里……”

languages.text: {n}Ein seliges Lächeln umspielt die Lippen des Mannes, und in der Ecke seiner zerstörten Augenhöhle bildet sich eine Träne.{/n} "Der Gottimperator hat Euch geschickt, mich zu retten ... Ihr seid Sein Licht ... Ihr seid Seine Gnade ... Danke ... Danke, dass Ihr mich nicht hier zurücklasst ..."
languages.original_text: {n}A blissful smile twists the man's lips, and a tear forms at the corner of his ruined eye socket.{/n} "The God-Emperor has sent you to save me... You are His light... You are His grace... Thank you... Thank you for not leaving me here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein seliges Lächeln umspielt die Lippen des Mannes, und in der Ecke seiner zerstörten Augenhöhle bildet sich eine Träne.{/n} "Der Gottimperator hat Euch geschickt, mich zu retten ... Ihr seid Sein Licht ... Ihr seid Seine Gnade ... Danke ... Danke, dass Ihr mich nicht hier zurücklasst ..."

languages.text: {n}Adamın dudakları kıvrılıp mesudane bir gülümseme meydana getirirken mahvolmuş gözünün kenarında bir damla gözyaşı beliriyor.{/n} "Tanrı İmparator gönderdi sizi, beni kurtarasınız diye... O'nun nurusunuz... Teşekkür ederim... Beni burada bırakmadınız..."
languages.original_text: {n}A blissful smile twists the man's lips, and a tear forms at the corner of his ruined eye socket.{/n} "The God-Emperor has sent you to save me... You are His light... You are His grace... Thank you... Thank you for not leaving me here..."
